physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Hard, fixed and tender bony swelling on the distal part of the right tibia; lesion not adherent to the skin, not associated with ulceration or elevated temperature; diffuse and extensive swelling; neurovascular status of the right lower limb normal; systemic physical examination revealed no abnormal findings.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Patient was asymptomatic and showed no recurrence at last follow-up visit, 12 months after surgery.
